PngText.StringValue: Title = A bit of test metadata which should be compressed
PngText.Name: Title
PngText.Description: Short (one line) title or caption for image

PngText.StringValue: Comment (Комментарии) = A bit of international/Russian (международный) test metadata which should be compressed (ru-RU)
PngText.Name: Comment

PngText.StringValue: Custom Keyword (Пользовательское ключевое слово) = Custom международный text metadata which should also be compressed (ru-RU)
PngText.Name: Custom Keyword

Exif.StringValue: XPTitle = A bit of test metadata for image title
Exif.Name: XPTitle

Exif.StringValue: PhotoUserComment = A bit of normal международный comment text
Exif.Name: PhotoUserComment
